F\u00fchrerbunker: Bundesarchiv Bild 183-V04744, Berlin, Garten der zerstörte Reichskanzlei.jpg | July 1947 photo of the rear entrance to the Führerbunker in the garden of the Reich Chancellery. The bodies of Hitler and Eva Braun were burned in a shell hole in front of the emergency exit at left; the cone-shaped structure in the centre served for ventilation, and as a bomb shelter for the guards.
